subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which event marked the establishment of the Rajasthan state?
question_hi: राजस्थान को कैसे स्थापित किया गया है?
A_en: The merger of Mewar and Marwar
B_en: The creation of Rajasthan after Indian independence
B_hi: भारतीय आत्मता के बाद राजस्थान की संदर्भ
D_en: The formation of Rajasthan as a separate state
explanation_en: Rajasthan was created as a separate state after Indian independence, whereas the other options refer to events that led to the establishment of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: भारतीय आत्मता के पूर्वानी के विभागीय बार्ही के भागीय मानवी

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which dynasty ruled Rajasthan from 10th century to 14th century?
question_hi: राजस्थान के वर्षीय ज्ञान के 10th संवतीय मानविता
explanation_en: The Chauhans were the ruling dynasty in Rajasthan from the 10th century to the 14th century.
explanation_hi: चौहान राजा समाज पर 10th संवतीय मानविता, 14th संवतीय मानविता के बाद
D_hi: बंदेलकंद रानी, 14th संवतीय मानविता समाज, 1200 AD के बाद

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Hindu king of Mewar?
question_hi: मेवार के पहले मेघाली में पहले HINDU KING है
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha was the first Hindu king of Mewar region during the early medieval period.
explanation_hi: राणा कुम्भ मेवार मेघाली में पहले HINDU KING है
